qas.question: In what year did Sony and BMG Germany merge?
In August 2014, Sony entered a joint venture with whom?
Who continued to operate its Chinese music business independently?
ABC Japan was made part of what?
Beckman Music Group is located in which country?

context: In August <a0_0>2004<a0_0/>, Sony entered joint venture with <b1_0>equal partner Bertelsmann<b1_0/>, by merging Sony Music and Bertelsmann Music Group, <b4_0>Germany<b4_0/>, to establish Sony BMG Music Entertainment. However <b2_0>Sony<b2_0/> continued to operate its Japanese music business independently from Sony BMG while BMG Japan was made part of <b3_0>the merger<b3_0/>.
